outputs.output_descr:
The project has as its main objective the development of a national system of human rights indicators. 

The system has three main objectives: 
1.        Supporting the public institutions on the formulation, monitoring and evaluation of public policies, with an emphasis on HR dimensions. 
2.        Strengthening civil society role in monitoring government activities related to human rights. 
3.        Offering more complete information to international organizations to collaborate in their work related to international HR instruments and agreements. This activity is being developed in the context of a joint technical cooperation project, leaded by UNDP and UNFPA.

project_descr: BRA/11/003 -  Informações em Direitos Humanos: identificando potenciais e construindo indicadores.
